errors.name: InvalidThreshold
errors.msg: The provided threshold is not within valid range (0-100)

errors.name: InvalidValidityPeriod
errors.msg: The provided validity period must be greater than zero

errors.name: UnauthorizedOrganizationUpdate
errors.msg: Only the organization creator can update parameters

errors.name: InvalidContributor
errors.msg: Only active contributors can perform this action

errors.name: AlreadyContributor
errors.msg: This account is already a contributor

errors.name: ProposalExpired
errors.msg: Proposal has expired

errors.name: AlreadyVoted
errors.msg: This account has already voted on this proposal

errors.name: InsufficientTokenBalance
errors.msg: Voter does not have enough tokens to vote

errors.name: UnauthorizedProjectAction
errors.msg: Only project members can vote on or create tasks

errors.name: InvalidStateForAction
errors.msg: This action is not allowed in the current state

errors.name: InsufficientTaskVotes
errors.msg: Task has not received enough votes to be completed

errors.name: ProjectExpired
errors.msg: The project validity period has expired

errors.name: InvalidBudgetAmount
errors.msg: Invalid budget amount specified

errors.name: ProposalNotActive

errors.name: InvalidTaskStatus
errors.msg: Task status is not in the right state for this action

errors.name: InvalidContributorAccount
errors.msg: The provided contributor account does not match the expected PDA

errors.name: InvalidQuorumRequirement
errors.msg: Invalid quorum requirement, must be between 1-100%

errors.name: InvalidOrganizationName
errors.msg: Invalid organization name

errors.name: ProposalNotApproved
errors.msg: Proposal must be approved to create a project

errors.name: InsufficientBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient account balance for this operation

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccount
errors.msg: Token account does not belong to the voter

errors.name: InvalidTokenMint
errors.msg: Token account mint does not match organization's token mint

errors.name: InvalidProjectAccount
errors.msg: The provided project account does not match the expected PDA

errors.msg: Insufficient funds in treasury for this transfer

errors.msg: This proposal has already been executed

errors.name: InvalidTransferAmount

errors.name: TokenNotRegistered

errors.name: RegistryAlreadyExists

errors.name: MaximumTokensReached
errors.msg: Maximum number of treasury tokens reached
